p: To develop an analytical method for selective quantification of individual keto-boswellic acids in Boswellia oleogum resins, initially, 11-keto-α-boswellic acid (α-KBA, syn. (3α,4β)-3-hydroxy-11-oxo-olean-12-en-24-oic acid) was synthesized and characterized. Starting from acetyl-α-boswellic acid (α-ABA), firstly, acetyl-11-keto-α-boswellic acid (α-AKBA) was synthesized by radical-type reaction with bromine and characterized as previously described [ 17]. Afterwards, α-KBA was synthesized by saponification of α-AKBA, with subsequent purification by semi-preparative reversed-phase HPLC.
